ComicInfo.Penciller: Antonio Conversano,Don Secrease,Jeff Austin,Luciano Bernasconi,Mark Glidden,Stephanie Heike,Stephanie Sanderson,Sylvan Varreau
ComicInfo.Summary: ALL-NEW!! NOT A SINGLE PAGE OF REPRINT!! Former FF writer/artist Don Secrease returns with a mysterious revelation involving his own addition to Femforce history, their one-time leader: Colt, the weapons mistress, in: "Whatever Happened To Shorty?" The mystery unfolds over the last year, as Femforce members MISS VICTORY, STARDUST, TARA, SHE-CAT, SYNN & NIGHTVEIL take on various old Colt villains; like Montague Moon, Bric-a-Brac, Pinto, Tagg, and more. All easily dispatched, but as the FFers begin to wonder why their diminutive former leader was not available to defeat her old foes, Nightveil goes to the source- and finds a shocking revelation!! Script by Done Secrease, pencils by Secrease, Mark Glidden, Stephanie Sanderson-Heike, Sylvain Varreau, and Jeff Austin, with inks throughout by Mark G. Heike. Then, another Golden Age great is revived at AC as Rulah, the Jungle Queen (one-time bosomy brunette bombshell of Victor Fox's great "good girl art" comics of the 1940's) returns in all-new jungle action in "Clash of the Gods", written by Enrico Teodorami, with art by Antonio Conversano. See Rulah battle Kutulu, the giant jungle ape. Plus, a pair of Blue Bulleteer "short subjects"- "Night of Countess Hells", by Teodorani and Conversano, and "Blue Bulleteer Captured", written by Teodorani, with art by Luciano Bernasconi. Great glamor and action in the classic tradition featuring the longest-running female super-team in comics history. 44 pages, black & white with color covers. Standard comic book format.
ComicInfo.Title: Blue Bulleteer Captured!; Clash of Gods!; Night of Countess Hella; Whatever Happened to Shorty?
